Text: I'm not sure about the first R6 games (R6+Eagle watch), but Rogue Spear should work in WinXP if you disable AA+AF and open a web browser and set to game to run in Win2k mode (I'm not kiddidng, it actually works. Don't forget to open a browswer, like Internet Explorer or Firefox).
